MONGO_COLLECTION.description: The mongo collection to connect to.

API_SECRET.description: User generated password required for REST API and other features (12 character minimum).

ENABLE.description: Space delimited list of optional features to enable.  Leave blank for a default site.

PUSHOVER_API_TOKEN.description: Pushover API token, required for Pushover notifications.  Leave blank for a default site.

PUSHOVER_USER_KEY.description: Pushover user key, required for Pushover notifications.  Leave blank for a default site.
